contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Lurasidone is a benzothiazol derivative that is an antagonist and binds with high affinity to Dopamine 2 D2 Ki 0 994 nM 5 HT2A Ki 0 47 nM receptors and 5 HT7 receptors Ki 0 495 nM It also binds with moderate affinity to alpha 2C adrenergic receptors Ki 10 8 nM and is a partial agonist at 5 HT1A receptors Ki 6 38 nM Its actions on histaminergic and muscarinic receptors are negligible
